author: Zughy
long_description:
#### What's new: 2.2.0 - "Audio_lib"
* Add audio_lib as optional dependency
* audio_lib: use custom "notifications" type for sounds
* Play join sound also to the player who's just joined

[Older changelogs](https://gitlab.com/zughy-friends-minetest/parties/-/releases)

### Commands
* `/party disband`: disbands a party
* `/party help`: see all the subcommands and what they do 
* `/party invite <player>`: invites a player to a party
* `/party join <player>`: accepts an invitation request, if any. If `player` is specified, accepts that specific player request
* `/party kick <player>`: kicks `player` from the party
* `/party leave`: leaves a party. If the party leader leaves, the role is assigned to another player (except if there were 2 people)


##### Chat 
* `/p <message>` writes a message in the party chat

### Developers
[In-depth API documentation](https://gitlab.com/zughy-friends-minetest/parties/-/blob/master/DOCS.md)
name: parties
short_description: Team up with your friends and create a party!
title: Parties
